quizSynopsis: Test your knowledge of science with this fun quiz!

questions.question: What is the chemical symbol for water?
questions.messageForCorrectAnswer: Correct! H2O is the chemical symbol for water.

questions.question: Which planet in our solar system is the hottest?
questions.messageForCorrectAnswer: Correct! Venus is the hottest planet due to its thick atmosphere.

questions.question: What gas do plants primarily absorb for photosynthesis?
questions.messageForCorrectAnswer: Correct! Plants absorb carbon dioxide during photosynthesis.

questions.question: How many bones are there in the human body?
questions.messageForCorrectAnswer: Correct! An adult human has 206 bones.
